creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: huipil has black and white base cloth with multicolored embroidery; embroidered decorations consist of row upon row of floral motifs; huipil is made of four different panels; neck opening is circular and outlined with detailed floral embroidery; sleeves consist of slits cut in huipil's sides and are decorated with black velvet fabric; collar is dark red and made of a synthetic based cloth
medium: Cotton, silk, metal fiber, synthetic fiber
title: Huipil
